mapper.insert: INSERET INTO b_files (file_key, ori_name, save_name, save_path) VALUES(#{file_key},#{ori_name},#{save_name},#{save_path})
mapper.select: SELECT b.num, f.file_key f.ori_name, f.save_name, f.save_path, ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM b_files as f INNER JOIN b_board as b ON (f.file_key = b.file_key) WHERE b.num = #{num} AND del_chk = 'N'
